description.line: PDF Export: Horizontal alignment of the time preference column changed to left (was center).
Fix bug in IE: external link should open in a new window.

Fixed problem "The course cannot be renamed. A course with the same course number already exists." when a course offering edit screen was used on a non-controlling cross-listed course of a different subject area than the controlling course but with the same course number as the controlling course.

Fixed bug: When the change in cross-list results in a change of controlling department of an instructional offering, all departmental classes (i.e., classes that are managed by the controlling department) have to have their managing department changed to the new controlling department.
Property General.DepartmentIds was not correctly computed in the case when multiple solver groups were loaded together -- it did contain only departments of the first solver group.
Constraint solver updated, see https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/cpsolver-cvs for more details.
Import of Academic Area Reservations: Skip over a reservation if the academic area is not found.

Fixed problems with creation of the database schema for certain versions of MySQL (table APPLICATION_CONFIG). Fixed problem ERROR 1071 (specified key was too long) on table application_config. Fixed problem ERROR 1170 (BLOB/TEXT column 'name' used in key specification without a key length) that occurred on MySQL 4.1.
Fix parse exception caused by non numeric io limit.
Print instructional offering limit.

Course Reservations (on a class): Fixed problem: The instructional offering limit is not displayed. Fixed problem: If there are two courses listed in a reservation on a class and the user wants to delete the first one (clicks on the Delete button next to the first one), the second course is deleted instead.
Fix parse exception cause by non numeric io limit.
Fixed hibernate exception.
Updated display of schedule subpart limits
Added ability to mark all classes of a subpart as display instructors.
Added ability to mark all classes of a subpart as display in schedule.
Fixed bug with Display All Instructors and Display All in Schedule.

Changed Display Instructors and Display in Schedule to show the checkmark icon (tick.gif) when they are true and the schedule deputy does not have permission to edit the field. Used to display the word true or false. This applies to both the subpart rows and then class rows.
Added change in row background color when mousing over a subpart row. Class rows did this already.
Cleaned up alignment of scheduling subpart limit labels.
Fixed Javascript Errors with subtotals in IE.
Fixed Javascript Error that prevented min/max limit from being syncronized.
Fixed Button alignment on bottom of screen.
Fix bug that deleted instr offering when a configuration was deleted.
Column Name renamed to Class.
Use NaturalOrderComparator for ordering cells in a timetable grid (the case when two or more classes overlap in time).
Week -1 can represent the last week of the previous year (visible, e.g., for Spring 2008 term), value of selection 'All weeks' changed to -100 (was -1).
Visualisation of the weeks of the previous year corrected (former reasoning "week < 0 implies all weeks" was wrong in this case).
Only display application properties that starts with tmtbl. This feature is customizable by property tmtbl.appConfig.pattern, default is the regular expression ^tmtbl\..*$

With every class, estimate the number of possible placements and refuse to load a class if the number of placements exceed 1 000 000, the following error is printed:
Class C has too many possible placements (X). The class was not loaded in order to prevent out of memory exception. Please restrict the number of available rooms and/or times for this class.
( where C is the name of the class, and X is the estimated number of placements )
otherwise, print the following warning if the number of placements exceed 10 000:
Class C has quite a lot of possible placements (X). Solver may run too slow. If possible, please restrict the number of available rooms and/or times for this class.
( where C is the name of the class, and X is the estimated number of placements )
Ask web server for its application properties before constructing a database connection.
Constraint solver updated, see https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/cpsolver-cvs for more details.
Propagate application property default_schema into the hibernate configuration, if it is set.
Size of column APPLICATION_CONFIG.NAME changed to match the hibernate configuration.
Woebegon College Example: In table APPLICATION_CONFIG, property systemAccessLevel changed to tmtbl.access_level, systemMessage changed to tmtbl.system_message.
Fixed exception that occurs when course has no configurations and hence no instructional offering limit.
Fix display of error message regarding mismatch in limits if the screen loads without any pre-existing reservations.
Suppress display of mimatch limits if there are any blank values in the reserved spaces field.
For reservations on class: check that the number of reservation does not exceed the number of courses in the offering.
Allow deletion of course reservations on class.
Fix exceptions caused when inst offering limit and/or course offering limits are null.
Course Reservations: On screen load - Do not add blank row if no. of reservations >= no. of courses in the offering.
For global room features/groups: only display rooms from the current academic session.
For departmental room features/groups: do not display rooms that are no longer shared by the feature's/group's department.
Course offering and course timetable export added DTDs CourseOfferingExport.dtd and CourseTimetable.dtd updated
Location of custom properties can be redefined by tmtbl.custom.properties property. It can also be passed to JVM as a system property, e.g., -Dtmtbl.custom.properties=~/my.properties.
Macromedia image files imported from the old Timetabling project.
Constraint solver updated, see https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/cpsolver-cvs for more details.
For external manager with only one department (e.g., LAB) -- display the rooms of the department right away.
Fixed display problem of departmental room features (sometimes, multiple features were displayed in a single row).
Table ordering corrected (each table can be ordered separately, but only ordering of the class rooms table was actually used).
For external manager with only one department (e.g., LAB) -- display Export PDF button next to other buttons (Search/Export PDF component is not present).
Removed color coding of total.
Made changes pertaining to display of totals.
Hide 'Add New' button as it is not useful
Removed color coding of total.
Made changes pertaining to display of totals.
Fixed bug deleted object will be resaved ...
Fixed bug that makes abbv column un-sortable if any one value is null.
Validate that subject area has no offered courses when delete operation is selected.
Use settings value to determine if menus are expanded on user login. By default it is not.

Added (optional) on fly student sectioning In this mode, students are resectioned after each iteration, but only between classes that are affected by the iteration. This slows down the solver, but it can dramatically improve results in the case when there is more stress put on student conflicts (e.g., Woebegon College example).
Various fixes and improvements, see https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/cpsolver-cvs for more details.
StudentImport and LastLikeCourseDemandImport are now inherited from BaseImport.
StudentImport: speed improved by not using StudentDAO.save(student); all students for given academic session are deleted first
LastLikeCourseDemandImport: all last-like course demands for given academic session are deleted first
Data Import page now uploads the selected file (using Struts file upload).
Added SQL scripts to create timetable schema and populate it with Woebegon College test suite for Oracle.
Offline copy of UniTime wiki (http://www.unitime.org/wiki) added into the distribution.
Added on fly student sectioning solver parameters.
Enabled on fly student sectioning in Default solver configuration.
Enabled load of student enrollments for commited solutions in Default solver configuration.
Added roomFeaturesInOneColumn user setting.
Added methods for cloning of instructional offerings and all underlaying objects (configurations, subparts, classes, etc).
ApplicationProperties: Removed shutdown hook since InitServlet.destroy() shuts the listener down; removed encoding from messages
Changed timetabling banner to make consistent with the one used inside the application
Room Features, Room Groups: Abbreviation column added
Room Detail, Room Edit: Administrator can see and change external id.
Room Detail, Room Edit: Administrator can change room type (property Room.scheduledRoomType).
Allow Add Special Use Room only when external rooms are populated for the given session.
Added add any room capability (administrator only).
Made screen more intuitive.
Display of the selected date pattern corrected.

Fix Generated feature improved replace the generated date pattern with an existing one if the difference is not more than 5 days otherwise rename the generated date pattern to "generated start - end" where start and end are start and end days in MM/dd format
Subject Areas: Struts configuration corrected.
Buildings: Add/update/delete functions added.
Buildings, Timetable Managers, Departments, Subject Areas, Solver Groups: Export PDF function added.
Application Config: Display all effective properties set for the application.
FAQ and Tips & Tricks pages moved to wiki.
Instructor Lookup: Fixed problem with I2A2 lookup (No getter method for property: "puid" of bean: "i2a2") -- User object has no longer method getPuid(), but it has getId().
Instructor Delete: Fixed hibernate problem (deleted object would be re-saved by cascade) when an instructor with some class assignments was deleted.
Distribution preferences that are set on instructors were not filtered by course number, this is now corrected.
Add/Edit Distribution Preference: Compare classes using ClassComparator, not by their unique ids.
Load academic areas, classifications, majors, and minors
Solver update, https://lists.sourceforge.net/lists/listinfo/cpsolver-cvs for more details.
Database connection properties can be set in custom.property file
Buildings: Minor change to remove non-existent building as part of update process.
Major Import: Create empty set for academic areas if null.
Configuration Edit: Fixed org.hibernate.PropertyAccessException (Exception occurred inside setter of org.unitime.timetable.model.Class_.managingDept)
ChangeLog: queries made cacheable.
Last-like Course Demands Import: speed up -- cache the SubjectAreas and CourseOfferings.
Timetabling CSS: Fixed a bug.
WebTable: Removed italic tag and instead depend on css to do all formatting
Changed logos to remove SMAS and put unitime.org.
File footer.jsp removed -- it is not used.
Tags propertyEquals and propertyNotEquals added.
Use property tags instead of using ApplicationProperties class directly in JSPs.
This is a first Open Source release of this application.
See http://www.unitime.org for more details.
